question.questionText: 2 groups used marbles to weigh the same apple. Jin's group found the apple weighed 35 marbles and Bee's group found the same apple weighed 60 marbles. Both groups used the correct procedure. Since they weighed the same apple, what do you think happened to make the results different?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The marbles used by the 2 groups were probably different masses.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: They use different sizes of marbles.
